game_description: Bond with a baby falcon and go on an adventure. Falcon Age is a first-person, single-player action adventure where you’ll play as Ara in her fight to reclaim her cultural legacy in the lost art of falcon hunting against a force of automated colonizers. The game starts on a dying colony planet with its culture destroyed, resourced depleted, and turned into a desert by machine invaders. Ara’s been wrongfully thrown in jail for a minor infraction. While she awaits her fate in a lonely cell, she passes the time by befriending a young falcon. Together they escape and set off on an adventure to help the resistance reclaim their freedom and drive off the invaders.
Languages: English, French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Mexico)
review_1: Good game I’ve replayed it so many times
review_2: You got da little baby! You can hunt with your falcon, experience an amazing story Please feel free to dm me if you would like the code

review_4: We can’t get past the whipping part as the whip won’t work! He loves it but nothing we do seems to fix the issue. Has anyone had this before and if so how did you fix it as it’s stopping him progress in the game? (We obtain the weapon but it won’t work) If this was working though it would be 5 stars so don’t be put off buying.
